My friend and former manager sharing some knowledge on Gene Kim's End to End ü§ò She‚Äôs talking End to End at Concur
Donnell Baker , Oliver Stone Sindayigaya , Brayden Van Ackeren , Steve Thurman , Yovka Pencheva ,
My partner and I took over a restaurant in bankruptcy.
We were grinding every hour, every day.
The restaurant business absorbs your entire life.
We couldn‚Äôt do it alone anymore.
We had to hire someone more senior.
Managed multi-million dollar food and beverage chains.
Ready to take Citizen Smith to the next level.
Everything was finally falling into place.
But on his first day, I caught him doing cocaine in the bathroom.
‚ÄúHand in your resignation or I‚Äôll call the cops and they can handle this.‚Äù
My team thought I was overreacting.
‚ÄúBen, this is the restaurant business. We have to do whatever it takes.‚Äù
It‚Äôs not about doing ‚Äúwhatever it takes.‚Äù
It‚Äôs about setting standards for whom you work with.
The type of environment you create.
I don‚Äôt care if you‚Äôre the best in the business.
Toxic behavior/bullshit doesn‚Äôt fly in my office.
In business, you have to be ready to hire fast and fire faster.
Even if your mind is telling you otherwise.
If you can‚Äôt set the precedent when things are tough.
We‚Äôre looking for a few amazing folks to round out our marketing team! http://bit.ly/2zS9i83 #fons #hiring
I dumped my 150K follower Instagram account.
And I‚Äôm tripling down on LinkedIn.
I don‚Äôt need a blue check mark to prove my worth.
And I sure don‚Äôt need free swag for a shoutout on my account.
I don‚Äôt have time for vanity as a CEO.
This rockstar personal brand is a joke.
I‚Äôm over the artificial growth to maintain an image.
It‚Äôs a game of keeping up with the Joneses.
There are no deals closing, and most ‚Äúinfluencers‚Äù don‚Äôt make money.
When I stopped posting, people messaged me,
‚ÄúDid you have a falling out with your business partners?‚Äù
I don‚Äôt need to trade a fake perception for likes.
I need real feedback to test, iterate, and improve.
So I listened to my gut.
It‚Äôs stronger than any financial model, analytics tool, or advisor that I know.
And it‚Äôs telling me to trade the followers for happiness.
We live in a word where the YouTube Prankster has more camera crews than The Bachelor.
If you want vanity - you can have it.
I didn‚Äôt sign up to be an actor.
I signed up to be me.
